alert.note: Alert for Neshoba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 9:30AM CST until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Above Philadelphia. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Thursday the stage was 14.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.7 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Pearl River Philadelphi 13.0 14.4 Thu 8 am CST 14.6 14.2 13.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 8 PM CST.
